
# Production Environment Variables (Sanitized)
# Role: Admin Panel (Frontend via Next.js)
# Host: Vercel

NODE_ENV=production

# API Connection
NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL="https://skinluxe-meerut-api.onrender.com/api"

# Authentication
# JWT handling is done via HTTP-only cookies from API, so Admin might not need JWT_SECRET unless decoding locally.
